title: King on a person oriented society - context

content.question: The reference to “the world revolution” in the excerpt most directly refers to which of the following developments in international affairs following the Second World War?

choices.label: Decolonization and the emergence of nationalist movements in Asia and Africa
The beginning of the Cold War in Europe
United States support for anticommunist regimes in Latin America
United States efforts to create a national energy policy

content.answer: Decolonization and the emergence of nationalist movements in Asia and Africa
